title: [PATCH] Add ability to specify the segment name when optimizing an index
description:
In my application I need to keep the filenames in my index from changing from 
one index build to the next. I modified the index writer to allow me to supply 
a segment name when I optimize the index. I thought this might be useful to 
others, so I'm attaching a patch with my change.

This patch is against the CVS HEAD on January 18th, 2005 around 3:30pm Eastern 
Time

comments.content:
Created an attachment (id=14042)
Added new optimize method allowing a segment name.
comments.author: Eric Isakson

comments.content: I think it's too dangerous to offer an API through IndexWriter to pick the name of segments that are written.
comments.author: Michael McCandless
